content: **this pattern is part of the summer 2024 collaboration between pom pom and hobbii** **sizes ** 1 2 3 4 **foot circumference ** 18 20 22 24 cm / 7¼ 8 8¾ 9½ leg length 6cm / 2¼ foot length is adjustable **materials ** hobbii unicorn solid 75% wool 25% polyamide 100 g 3 5 oz = 400 m 437 yds shade green tea 26 1 1 1 1 skein **needles ** 2 5 mm / us 1½ 100 cm / 40 circular needle for magic loop 2 25 mm / us 1 100cm / 40 circular needle for magic loop always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **gauge ** 30 sts & 44 row = 10cm / 4 over st st on 2 5mm needles after blocking **pattern information ** the sock is worked top down starting with a decorative cuff then an eyelet pattern is used for the leg a heel flap is then worked the eyelet pattern continues over the top of the foot and the sole is worked in stocking stitch decreases are worked for the toe which is then grafted together **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1
